p: Various bio-functions also were examined using the IPA ® default settings for these analyses ( Figure 4). Bio-function activation is assumed for Z-scores > 1.96σ, and bio-function inhibition is assumed for Z-scores < −1.96σ. All of these indicated bio-functions also had significant p-values. PR8 activated many bio-functions, including cellular movement categories, inflammatory response, and angiogenesis, and inhibited few bio-functions; organ inflammation and anatomical organ inflammation.
